snippet.title: Cards & Tankards Early Alpha Gameplay Footage
snippet.description:
We are Divergent Realities, and this is early alpha footage of our game, Cards & Tankards! Cards & Tankards is a virtual reality game that combines the laid-back atmosphere of a fantasy tavern with the fun of a collectible card game. Cards & Tankards allows players to both battle for bragging rights and just hang out with friends over a deck of cards. 

If you would like to stay updated on Cards & Tankards, please like, and follow our social media for new information as well as for any future projects by Divergent Realities! 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DivergentRlity 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/divergent_realities/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/3Be6uxY
